section.title: Overview
section.para: Module for updating ISUP encapuslated in SIP (SIP-T/SIP-I)
The sipt module can be used to update various ss7 headers contained inside a message.

section.title: Dependencies
section.para:
The module depends on the following modules (in the other words the listed modules must be loaded before this module):
none

updates the IAM in the body if it exists, setting the called party number to destination with the nature address specified in nai and decrementing the hop counter value if present. If the hop counter header is missing it will be added with the value of hops.

example.title: sipt_destination(destination, hops, nai) usage

section.para: Returns the value of the Hop Counter for the IAM message if it exists. Returns -1 if there isn't a hop counter.

example.title: sipt_get_hop_counter() usage

section.para: Returns the value of the Calling Party Category for the IAM message. Returns -1 if there is a parsing error.

example.title: sipt_get_cpc() usage

section.para: Returns the value of the Nature of Address Indicator of the Calling Party for the IAM message. Returns -1 if there is a parsing error or if the Calling Party Number is not present.

example.title: sipt_get_calling_party_nai() usage

section.para: Returns the value of the Nature of Address Indicator of the Called Party for the IAM message. Returns -1 if there is a parsing error.

example.title: sipt_get_called_party_nai() usage
